name: sainsorscience-bot
description: A bot whom provides science quizzes from Malaysia's governmental secondary schools with both Malay (Bahasa Melayu) and English support. (PROJECT IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH THE GOVERNMENT)

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npx tsc -w & npx nodemon build | npx pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss'
scripts.startNoClean: npm run build && npx tsc -w & npx nodemon build | npx pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss'
